description:
This is promising music player which appears to be still early in its development and one can only hope for a few more bells & whistles to come.

But as is, it's a plain interface but still modern in look and style. Don't expect all kinds of features, but that can be a good thing. If you simply want to play your music and get the job done in a clean, straightforward manner, this app might be ideal for you.

I've tried/tinkered with just about every music player there is (in Windows about a decade ago when that is all I had to use) and within the Linux ecosystem. So many good choices around and there's nothing wrong with installing multiple players for whatever suits your mood and intentions at the time.

I'll be keeping Musicly on my computer (Linux Lite 5.8) and looking forward to any potential updates and added features. As a plain-Jane player, it's a worthy app if you just want something to quickly play music and have a pleasant interface to deal with.
For me it, when it worked it was too basic. But in crashes everytime try to do anything.

Muy Buena aplicación es Simplemente lo que buscas si es un reproductor de Musica, muy buena interfaz y vista sin fallas y Diseño.

Solo Pediria que tengan versión en Español
хороший звук, оригинальный дизайн. Движок определяется как Хромиум.
